lower: https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/strings/lower?version=stable upper: https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/strings/upper?version=stable

<denchmark-h:h3>Clear description</denchmark-h>
The first line of the docstrings for these functions is the auto-generated "TODO: add doc." instead of an actual summary. <denchmark-h:h3>Submit a pull request?</denchmark-h>
Yes, I'll be submitting one shortly.

comments.comment: Closing this issue since the associated PR has been merged. Thanks!
